structure.unit: STATE UNIVERSITIES AND COLLEGES -- REGIONAL EDUCATION -- ARCHAEOLOGY

law.catch_line: Cancellation of agency contract by student-athlete.

text.section: A student-athlete may cancel an agency contract by giving notice of the cancellation to the athlete agent in a record within fourteen (14) days after the contract is signed.
A student-athlete may not waive the right to cancel an agency contract.

If a student-athlete cancels an agency contract, the student-athlete is not required to pay any consideration under the contract or to return any consideration received from the athlete agent to induce the student-athlete to enter into the contract.

law.history: Created 2003 Ky. Acts ch. 172, sec. 11, effective June 24, 2003.
